title: [Large-scale] Blockchain-Based Online Educational Content Evaluation System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating online learning platforms, understanding of blockchain fundamentals, knowledge of educational content evaluation methods
context.additional_context: A course cultivating the ability to overcome limitations of centralized evaluation systems and design decentralized assessment solutions for current practitioners

learning_goals: Explain methods to design systems ensuring content evaluation data integrity using blockchain distributed ledger technology
Propose an evaluation system architecture automating expert assessment processes via smart contracts
Develop and test a prototype of a decentralized evaluation system integrable with LMS environments

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
